MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA19 postcode area of Gourock, affecting properties in Kempock Street and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.06am. Our engineers have arrived Kempock Street substation and are investigating the cause of the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09.13am on Tuesday 2nd March 2021
